name: Blood Bath (Salyr Pls)
description:
Don't be afraid to get your hands dirty during times like these.

Fight your way throughs hordes of the living dead as you upgrade your weapons, and equipment in this thrilling COD ZOMBIES inspired shooter.

FEATURES:

-16 different weapons

-Mystery Box

-Multiple Lethal, and tactical equipment

-Large level with multiple paths

-Enemies drop powerups

-Earn cash from killing enemies

-Attempt to earn highscores

-Map hazards
